properties.title: PROPOSED ROAD DISPOSAL SECTION 152D ROADS ACT 1993
properties.description: Crown roads at Oaklands, within and adjoining Lots 62 & 64 DP756437 Lots 43, 44, 45 & 46 DP756439 Simpson Road. Also within and/or adjoining the property known as 'Grassmere' at 1120 Back Berrigan Road. (File ref: 25/01342, Cluster: 675591)
properties.html:
PROPOSED ROAD DISPOSAL SECTION 152D ROADS ACT 1993

In accordance with section 152D of the Roads Act 1993, notice is hereby given of the proposed sale of the Crown public roads listed in Schedule 1. If a sale proceeds, the road(s) will cease to be a public road upon transfer of the road to freehold land in accordance with section 152H of the Act.

Schedule 1:

  • Crown roads at Oaklands, within and adjoining Lots 62 & 64 DP756437 Lots 43, 44, 45 & 46 DP756439 Simpson Road.  Also within and/or adjoining the property known as 'Grassmere' at 1120 Back Berrigan Road. (File ref: 25/01342, Cluster: 675591) 

All interested persons are hereby invited to make submissions concerning the proposal via the email address below or to Department of Planning, Housing and Infrastructure - Crown Lands, PO Box 2215, DANGAR NSW 2309 within twenty-eight (28) days of the date of this advertisement.

Any person is entitled to make submissions with respect to the sale or disposal of the road. Please note that submissions may be referred to third parties (such as council or the applicant) for consideration in accordance with the Government Information (Public Access) Act 2009.

For further enquiries please visit the website https://roads.crownland.nsw.gov.au/ or contact Mandy Ade by email at mandy.ade@crownland.nsw.gov.au or on T:02 6640 3923 quoting file references above.


For the Manager, Divestments
